english.segment1: Sweet Jesus, wash over me. Would come and sweep me off of my feet, please. It's been two long weeks since You've heard me speak. And I was hoping that You might like to meet me. I heard You heal the broken hearted. Even those who've been discarded. Oh how I need You. I need to hear You say. Need to hear You say
english.segment2: Don't worry now. Don't worry how. Everything just seems to all work out. Would You sing me now to sleep
english.segment3: Sweet Jesus, wash over me. Would come and sweep me off of my feet, please. It's been far too long since I've sang Your song. And I was hoping that You might like to meet me. I heard You heal the broken hearted. Even those who've been discarded. Oh how I need You. I need to hear You say. Need to hear You say
english.segment4: Don't worry now. Don't worry how. Everything just seems to all work out. Would You sing me now to sleep
